tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Crowns and Bridges Fixing,Wisdom Tooth Extraction,RCT - Single Sitting,
review: The experience was very good. The doctors were really polite and their hands were very light. I visited several dentists before but the experiences were quite bad. The dentists in cosmaxx gave me a better and pain free experience. I would definitely recommend this clinic, ** ** *** *****

tags: None
review: I was in severe pain due to my wisdome toothache which was in my lower side and inside the bone..but Dr Mazin removed it soo awesomely i literally was badly in fear because of other people's story but he made them all untrue...i can 100 times can remove windome tooth i dint got swellness pain also got healed quickly..he is such a superb doctor.

tags: None
review:
My upper wisdom tooth gave me a tough time.. And I had a bad experience earlier so I was very scared.. But Dr. Mazin assured me a painless one.. I was prepared to be on the chair for almost 30-40 minutes and expected 2-3 stitches as well.. But to my surprise it was done in less than 15 mins.. It went so smooth with no stitches at all. 
I would recommend him for his smooth and light handed treatment.

tags: None
review:
Dr Mazin is so polite *** * ******** doctor. He will answer all your questions patiently and with layman explanation. 

He did wisdom tooth extraction in the last year for me *** ******* *********** ********* The procedure was done so nicely that there was no issue after post operation. Thank you so much Dr Mazin!! 

I highly recommend him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Mazin was very polite and extremely careful while conducting the procedure. So far he has operated me twice. ** ** **** ******* *** tactful enough to make the surgery/extraction as pain-free as possible. I'd highly recommend him and would like to go to him again for my pending wisdom teeth extraction.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Doctor was very friendly, very patient and gave explanations for each procedure done by him. He is well spoken and experienced.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review: Excellent approach towards treatment. Doctor has explained all the details in brief after taking xrays.
